name: Pirated Pirates
description:
Pirated Pirates is Tower Defence Game.

One day Some pirates attacked the island & started to destroy island base, They've got some Ships & trying to defeat us, There are Cannon Towers, Voodoo Towers & Boat bases on island to fight with Enemy.

Try your best to defeat them all.

-12 Levels on different parts of an Island
-12 Small to high enemy boats & ships.
-3 Types of weapons
-3 Types of power up
-Use your earned ingame coins to increase Weapons Abilities.
-XP will increase Power up timer.
